Package com.hissain.jscipy.signal.filter

Class Bessel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hissain.jscipy.signal.filter.Bessel
  • public class Bessel
extends java.lang.Object
    Bessel (Thomson) Filter implementation.

    Provides static methods for designing and applying Bessel filters, characterized by maximal flatness of the group delay (linear phase response).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      • lowPass

        public static com.hissain.jscipy.signal.filter.Biquad[] lowPass​(double sampleRate,
                                                                double cutoff,
                                                                int order)
        Design a low-pass Bessel filter.
        Parameters:
        sampleRate - The sampling rate in Hz.
        cutoff - The cutoff frequency in Hz.
        order - The order of the filter.
        Returns:
        Array of Biquad sections representing the filter.

        public static com.hissain.jscipy.signal.filter.Biquad[] bandPass​(double sampleRate,
                                                                 double lowCutoff,
                                                                 double highCutoff,
                                                                 int order)
        Design a band-pass Bessel filter.
        Parameters:
        sampleRate - The sampling rate in Hz.
        lowCutoff - The lower cutoff frequency in Hz.
        highCutoff - The upper cutoff frequency in Hz.
        order - The order of the filter.
        Returns:
        Array of Biquad sections representing the filter.

      • filtfilt

        public static double[] filtfilt​(double[] signal,
                                double sampleRate,
                                double cutoff,
                                int order)
        Apply a Bessel filter forward and backward (zero-phase filtering). Defaults to low-pass filter.
        Parameters:
        signal - Input signal array.
        sampleRate - Sampling rate in Hz.
        cutoff - Cutoff frequency in Hz.
        order - Filter order.
        Returns:
        Filtered signal with zero phase distortion.
